MAGFest 2026 Advanced Tournament

Double elimination format

name: Killer Queen and Friends 4
registration_message: Stay on site; play all night. BYOT and Draft Tournaments,
payment_message: Thank you for your KQAF 2025 Registration

name: Killer Queen and Close Friends (KQCF)
description:
An event run by the Baltimore KQ community;
Over a dozen local volunteers!
1-2 KQ cabs, stay on site, play all night. 2nd cab for 8+ teams
Like a smaller version of KQAF but with a bonfire and a hot tub. 
Dine on the finest BBQ, grilled cheese, pancakes, and french toast in all the land.

BYOT Saturday with groups and DE, 
Draft/PPP Sunday if there's interest.

As much trash as you can handle, but leave no trace. 

Tabletop Games, Pool Table, Bonfire, Hot Tub, Silent Disco

We can host about 15 people on site comfortably. 20+ if we snuggle.

This is taking place at a private residence and we are holding all attendees to the highest standard of excellent behavior. You will be asked to leave if you violate the Baltimore code of conduct. https://docs.google.com/document/d/1NlHYTVz92duf0EJhHbiTthEy4Uxl6okzzBqJABBaL8I/
registration_message:
BYOT Saturday with groups and DE, Draft/PPP Sunday
As much trash as you can handle, but leave no trace. 
Tabletop Games, Pool Table, Bonfire, Hot Tub, Silent Disco

We'll have 2 cabs if we have 8 or more teams.
We'll be cooking up some BBQ, grilled cheese and French toast and would love to see you there! 
We can host about 15 people on site comfortably. 
20+ if we snuggle.

This is taking place at a private residence and we are holding all attendees to the highest standard of excellent behavior. You will be asked to leave if you violate the Baltimore code of conduct.
payment_message: We'll be spending money on food, transport, maintenance, and supplies. If you feel so inclined, consider chipping in extra or bring something to share/grill/fry. Not required but the more we have the more we can share.

name: MAC December 2024
description:
Join us in Baltimore for the second episode of the Mid Atlantic Circuit!

One-day, one-cab tournament at Peabody Heights Brewery and after-party with private cab at Todd's house.
registration_message:
This is a fundraiser event to help cover costs associated with Magfest. Your registration helps support entry to the venue, magfest logistics, cab/stream parts & maintenance, and mac&cheese/drinks/refreshments at the after party.

Our code of conduct can be found here:
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1NlHYTVz92duf0EJhHbiTthEy4Uxl6okzzBqJABBaL8I/edit?usp=sharing
payment_message: Thank you for supporting and coming out.

name: Killer Queen and Friends 3
description:
Killer Queen and Friends is not your typical KQ event. We're focusing more on fellowship, gaming, and community and less on a serious high level tournament. We'll be staying at the Quaker Meeting House in Burlington NJ Thursday Aug 8 to Monday Aug 12th. There are only 88 bed spots. We're allowed to have more people at the event but only 88 can stay on site.

Meal plan includes brunch and dinner on Friday, Saturday, and Sunday. We'll also have some other snacks and late-night options. Beverage plan gets you a wristband.

On-site housing includes a twin bed in a shared room for Thursday night through Monday, sheets, blanket, pillow. (Take these home with you if you want, but bring them back next year!) Bring your own towel.

Your registration helps cover venue rental, truck rental and related cab transport costs, insurance and fees, consumables, stream/tech needs, and more.

Your meal plan fee covers the cost of food as well as comps for your fellow bees who are cooking for you. Feel free to tip them extra on site! We'd love your help in the kitchen, even if it's just cleaning up after one of the meals.

If you'd like to chip in extra to help and/or volunteer your time to prep food, please let us know!
registration_message:
Your Friends will be there.

Aug 8-12 Thursday 3pm to Monday 11am

Stay on site, play all night! Lots of meals, drinks, and games. We'll probably sell out this year. Please book early.
payment_message:
Stay on site, play all night! Lots of meals, drinks, and games. We'll probably sell out this year. Please book early.
The venue has increased in price so we've raised registration slightly to cover the difference.

name: Baltimore Brawl 6
description:
BYOT at "The Dugout", a brand new 3,400 ft² arcade space in Peabody Heights Brewery
* 3-4 KQ cabs
* extended venue hours
* literal tons of rhythm games on free play

Saturday groups, Sunday double elimination
registration_message:
**Baltimore Brawl bring your own team is back!**


Join us at a new arcade venue with 3,400 ft² of arcade space and 60+ fancy arcade games, including many unique rhythm games and MAGFest favorites like Jubeat.


### Introducing "The Dugout" at Peabody Heights Brewery! Come celebrate and bring your own team of 5 to compete.


We will have 3 cabs and can play late with special extended venue hours.


## Groups Saturday, DE Sunday. Prizes!


Weekend attractions include the [Flower Mart](https://mountvernonplace.org/flower-mart/) in Mt. Vernon and the [Kinetic Sculpture Race.](https://kineticbaltimore.com/)


## Please register by 4/30
If you are ordering a shirt the __deadline is 4/15__ to be sure we have one in your size.

### [Team sheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1yBpui59uTxZP4VPV6PHNqEVBe29N0DJtLiaA2JgDiP0/edit#gid=0) | [The Dugout @ Peabody Heights Brewery](https://www.peabodyheightsbrewery.com/)
payment_message:
Please register by 4/30 (if you are ordering a shirt the deadline is 4/15)

Please pay here with a credit card or send payment via Venmo to @BMoreKQ

name: Killer Queen and Friends
description:
Killer Queen and Friends is not your typical KQ event. We're focusing more on fellowship, gaming, and community and less on a serious high level tournament. We'll be staying at the Quaker Meeting House in Burlington NJ Thursday Oct 5-Monday Oct 9th. There are only 88 bed spots. We're allowed to have more people at the event but only 88 can stay on site. Please stay at the venue if you're able.

Meal plan includes brunch and dinner on Friday, Saturday, and Sunday. We'll also have some other snacks and late-night options. 

On-site housing includes a twin bed in a shared room for Thursday night through Monday, sheets, blanket, pillow. (Take these home with you if you want, but bring them back next year!) Bring your own towel.

Your registration helps cover venue rental, truck rental and related cab transport costs, insurance and fees, consumables, stream/tech needs, and more.

Your meal plan fee covers the cost of food as well as comps for your fellow bees who are cooking for you. Feel free to tip them extra on site! We'd love your help in the kitchen, even if it's just cleaning up after one of the meals.

If you'd like to chip in extra to help and/or volunteer your time to prep food, please let us know!
registration_message:
This is a "tournament" but really it's just come play games with your friends. 
And make new ones. 
And stay up **late.** 
And eat chef prepared food.
And play KQ in your PJs.
And sleep in a room with a dozen other nerds.
And play Dog Mode.
And pretend you're a Quaker.
And get stuck in an elevator.
~~And join a cult.~~

name: BB:R Manual Backup
description: This is a manual backup tournament with the team list in case we can't get the original challonge integrated one working in time.
